'''Poi Poi Chen''' is a former artist who worked for [[Mojang Studios]], specializing in 2D design. She worked on artwork for ''Scrolls'' until the development of the title ceased in June of 2015.<ref>https://scrolls.com/2015/06/its-been-a-blast-automaton</ref> Since leaving Mojang, she has returned to school to pursue a career in either programming or bio-medicine.<ref>{{tweet|PoiPoiChen|632483547891281920|(Officially) Studying natural sciences this fall for the proper grades for either programming or biomedicine next year.|August 15, 2015}}</ref>
